name: RTCPeerConnection.icecandidateerror_event
description: The WebRTC API event icecandidateerror is sent to an RTCPeerConnection if an error occurs while performing ICE negotiations through a STUN or TURN server. The event object is of type RTCPeerConnectionIceErrorEvent, and contains information describing the error in some amount of detail.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'icecandidateerror' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
